page.title: 04CHANGES IN FARMING
page.content: CHANGES IN FARMING AND THE AREA. Farming in this area has gradually changed over the last 100 years,as has the area itself.About 25 years ago the farmer was more physically involved and had a large workforce.Today, due to mechanisation, he employs at most 3 or 4 workers.Twenty years ago there were more farms near Erbistock but the small farms have been amalgamated . Some hedgerows and trees have been removed but in recent times farmers have become more conservation conscious.Rabbits are again becoming more of a problem and affect the amount of grazing.A lot of the cottages have been bought by outsiders and improved .Most of them work in nearby towns.
